import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a Message."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/Accounts/{AccountSid}/Messages/{Sid}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete a message from your project so it no longer appears in the dashboard or on the API. 
Any Media files that may be associated with this message are not deleted, and will still be 
available for access in the usual methods.

#### Permissions
The API token must include the following scopes: _Messaging_.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Path Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"AccountSid","in":"path","description":"The unique identifier of the project that sent or received this message.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"Sid","in":"path","description":"A unique ID that identifies this specific message.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><div>
  <div>
    <ApiTabs
      label={undefined}
      id={undefined}
    >
      <TabItem
        label={"204"}
        value={"204"}
      >
        <div>
          
          
          No Content
          
          
        </div><div>
          
        </div>
      </TabItem>
    </ApiTabs>
  </div>
</div>
